conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D hallmarks are present.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect score in fundamentals; clean geometry and consistent perspective.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent fidelity to the source plan. Minor variation in the kitchen corner/cabinet depth.

interior_elements.notes: Highly accurate placement of furniture and fixtures including kitchen appliances and bathroom layouts.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity, but points deducted for text labels over the 3D geometry which obscures rendering.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan are superimposed directly onto the 3D mesh interiors.

summary: This is a remarkably faithful 3D transformation that preserves architectural proportions and furniture layout with high geometric precision.
